notes: Homebrew 3E→5E conversions for armor & shield properties.
Daily refresh = once per dawn. 5E timing (Action/Bonus/Reaction).

Key-collision note: this set originally included 'animate_shield', which collides with the official XPHB Animate Shield in your core file. To avoid conflicts here the HB version is renamed to 'hb_animate_shield'.
appliesTo values are restricted to 'armor' and/or 'shield'. All textByKind values mirror the main entry when not meaningfully different.

variants.name: Animate Shield (HB)
entries: While holding this shield, you can use a Bonus Action to cause it to animate and hover in your space, protecting you as if you were wielding it and leaving your hands free for 1 minute. You can use a Bonus Action to end the effect early; it also ends if you die or become Incapacitated. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

textByKind.shield: While holding this shield, you can use a Bonus Action to cause it to animate and hover in your space, protecting you as if you were wielding it and leaving your hands free for 1 minute. You can use a Bonus Action to end the effect early; it also ends if you die or become Incapacitated. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.
